item.title: Fixing Gray Window screen, Java configuration error, window resize error
item.description: In this case, (Java) can be seen in this documentation article.

item.title: Fixing gaps around terminal windows Burpsuite
item.description: Adjust the size until finding the ideal scale that closes the gap, or toggle resizehints to 0 in config.h.

item.title: Dynamic Window Manager (Suckless)
item.description: The suckless developers created DWM, which stands for dynamic window manager. Itâ€™s a tiling window manager with a minimalist design. It takes less than 500MB of RAM and only a few processes when it first starts up. First and foremost, there is only one correct way to install dwm and other Suckless tools: from source (either straight from suckless.org).
